os.fullname: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)
os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)

name: NDOORS DDS Texture Conversion Suite
short_description:
There is NO virus. See banner next to download button. Some versions of Chrome appear to be incorrectly flagging the binaries as malicious. Feel free to download the source and build it yourself if you like.

-------------------

A utility suite for converting between the proprietary DDS format used by NDOORS Atlantica Online and the standard Microsoft DDS format.
